item.title: Hugo Ortiz joins the group
item.description: Hugo Ortiz, a Postdoctoral Fellow, has joined the Tectonophysics research group this January. He will be working on what infrasound can tell us about volcanoes and changes in the atmosphere.

item.title: Jade Eyles joins the group
item.description: Jade Eyles, a Postdoctoral Fellow, has joined the Tectonophysics research group this June. She will be working on identifying the connections between volcanic seismicity and eruptive behavior beneath the Etna volcano.

item.title: Emile Denise joins the group
item.description: Emile Denise, a Master's Student from École Normale Supérieure Paris, has joined the Tectonophysics research group this April. He will be working on developing new corrections to help us isolate the tectonic signal within InSAR displacement time series.

item.title: Mathilde Radiguet visiting during the spring
item.description: Mathilde will be visiting us as Fulbright Fellow and a Visiting Scientist from January until July. We're excited to have her here!

item.title: Rania Milki joins the group
item.description: Rania Milki, an undergraduate student on exchange from Imperial College London, is going to join the Tectonophysics research group this January. She will be working on detecting and locating tectonic tremor with machine learning.
